title: GraphQL test failure on Java18
body:
### Describe the bug

I've noticed the following test failure in one of the Java18 builds:
```
2022-12-23T14:49:53.3617558Z [ERROR] Tests run: 1, Failures: 1, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 10.939 s <<< FAILURE! - in io.quarkus.smallrye.graphql.deployment.ConcurrentAuthTest
2022-12-23T14:49:53.3621791Z [ERROR] io.quarkus.smallrye.graphql.deployment.ConcurrentAuthTest.concurrentAllFilmsOnly  Time elapsed: 8.899 s  <<< FAILURE!
2022-12-23T14:49:53.3622404Z org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: Unauthorized response codes were found ==> expected: <true> but was: <false>
```

### Expected behavior

_No response_

_No response_
